author: Luke Yee <lucyee01@meta.com>
description:
Hi Piotr,

Just wanted to stay on top of your inbox! My name is Luke and I support Meta’s Software Engineer Leadership hiring team!

We are building platforms for the Metaverse, GenAi, as well as large scale Infrastructure for Facebook, Ads, Search and Security. Please feel free to visit our blog to find out more about our mission and our community (https://www.facebook.com/careers/community/).<https://www.facebook.com/careers/community/).?__xts__%5B0%5D=131.AZzqr5LCb99BeJ-LFcbi0Dh4lHKTqaWGJy5IdkxUm2LKkYYy8lwcmObhIYSp0J-7St_YE4S0CppsYN1OVKLy2uE--XXHYVafNCFnzFOdYCt94uTUogy13KTax5bDl65UKOcTgX_D9r49rPTZDj7-2wo>

If you're open to exploring opportunities at Meta, I've included access to my calendar below so please feel free to pick a time to connect this week!

I look forward to discussing opportunities at Meta with you!

Thanks,
Luke
<https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.metacareers.com%2Fprofile%2Fcall%2F%3Fconsideration_id%3D1128167429476498%26recruiter_nonce%3D
title:
Staying on your radar for Engineering Leadership Opportunities at
 Meta
